name: Easy Japanese-Style Vegan Collard Greens
author: STRYDER256
summary: I made this impromptu for my family, and everyone freaked out. It contains no meat, so it's perfect for vegetarians or those who are trying to cut down on meat. It's amazingly simple to make...no more than 15 minutes, start to finish.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons gomasio (such as Eden Organic Foods®)
2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
directions: Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok until sizzling; add  , gomasio, and mirin
Cook until collard greens are tender, 3 to 5 minutes
Stir garlic into collard green mixture and cook just until garlic is fragrant, about 30 seconds; remove from heat
Season with additional sea salt if desired
